resources.string: Hello my name is Anthony Snelling. I am a graduate from Eastern Michigan University with a degree in Computer Science as well as a graduate from Washtenaw Community College with a degree in 3D animation, as well as a graduate from Animation Mentor school of character animation. I have a strong interest in app and web development as well as computer graphics. I love video games, films, and I also love to run, play guitar, and make art.
